```{r}
 # Libraries
library(tidyverse) 
library(COVID19)

# Examining situation in USA
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level = 2)
ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date , y = confirmed)) + geom_line() +
facet_wrap(~id)
```
